company: Vignan’s Foundation for Science, Technology & Research

projects.title: Portal Enhancement (VIMS)
projects.description: Revamped the Vignan’s Intelligent Event Management System by integrating a real-time weather API for dynamic backgrounds and optimized video performance by converting MP4 to WebM for faster loading & reduced server load.

projects.title: Registrar Document Management System
projects.description: Developed a role-based workflow for document entry & approval supporting three roles (DEO, AR, Registrar). Implemented dashboards for each role to manage submissions, approvals, and status tracking.

roleBasedFeatures.DEO: Submit bills, upload supporting documents, track status with filters.
roleBasedFeatures.AR: Review & approve DEO submissions before forwarding.
roleBasedFeatures.Registrar: Final authority to approve or reject after review.
